Loading Packages and data
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
```


```{r}
hockey <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flynnecon/datavizf25/refs/heads/main/data/hkygoaliewght.csv")
```


```{r plot 1980s}
ggplot(hockey) + geom_histogram(aes(x=d1980s))
```
